description: This course is an introduction to speaking, reading, and writing Japanese; writing includes the learning of all syllabic letters (Hiragana and Katakana) and basic Kanji (Chinese characters). Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required. Offered annually in the fall semester. Does not count toward Japanese major.
name: Beginning Japanese I
notes: Students in Japan 111B must also register for one lab Japan 111AL, BL, CL or DL.
